name: Raga's Room
description:
Raga's Room is a small interactive toy and a homage to:

Lost Decade Game's - A Wizard's Lizard

There is no objective or challenge just a room to explore and some items with different interactions.

--------------------------------------------------------

My entry for Jamuary 2017

--------------------------------------------------------

WASD - Move
Mouse - Look
LMB - Interact
RMB - Drop Item

-------------------------------------------------------

Check out my other projects @watchyrstep
